channel.title: Anyone have experience running a server/client on a mac? Need some client help
channel.description:
alrighty, so I've got the source to run via terminal. That's not a problem.
The client however, is giving me issues. I can't run it via the terminal or by clicking on the .class files. When I click on the .class files, I see the little java app pop up in my dock, but then it disappears.
I've tried to connect via the moparscape client and it connects, but than immediately disconnects. When I look in the terminal it says that my account was registered, the game was saved, than the account was deregistered. Not sure if that even means anything.
Either way, if anyone can try and help me figure out what's wrong, I'd really appreciate it. TV and Skype is an option - which I'd prefer than posting here or PMing. Skype is Flubby_PB

item.title: Anyone have experience running a server/client on a mac? Need some client help
item.dc:creator: @gunz4life gunz4life
item.description:
@gunz4life wrote:

Right click terminal -> New Window -> Basic (or whatever one you want)

Then type in “cd”, and drag and drop the folder with the class files onto the terminal and click enter

Then type in “java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32”, or whatever your run.bat originally had in it.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone have experience running a server/client on a mac? Need some client help

item.title: Anyone have experience running a server/client on a mac? Need some client help
item.dc:creator: @Flubbypb Flubbypb
item.description:
@Flubbypb wrote:

alrighty, so I’ve got the source to run via terminal. That’s not a problem.

The client however, is giving me issues. I can’t run it via the terminal or by clicking on the .class files. When I click on the .class files, I see the little java app pop up in my dock, but then it disappears.

I’ve tried to connect via the moparscape client and it connects, but than immediately disconnects. When I look in the terminal it says that my account was registered, the game was saved, than the account was deregistered. Not sure if that even means anything.

Either way, if anyone can try and help me figure out what’s wrong, I’d really appreciate it. TV and Skype is an option - which I’d prefer than posting here or PMing. Skype is Flubby_PB
